title: What Christian Bagg’s Journey to Leadville Means for the Future of Adaptive Mountain Biking
content:
Bagg, the founder of Bowhead Corp, will be the first rider to compete in the Leadville Trail 100 MTB race on a handcycle.

Read the full article at What Christian Bagg’s Journey to Leadville Means for the Future of Adaptive Mountain Biking on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
